English:
(I haven't been able to contact Yu since then.
What in the world happened to him?)
Chinese:
（……那次之後就聯絡不上優，
　優……到底發生什麼事了？）
Korean:
(……그 이후로 유우랑 연락이 되지 않아.
 유우……대체 어떻게 된 걸까)
German:
(Ich konnte Yu seitdem nicht mehr erreichen.
Was ist nur mit ihm geschehen?)

English:
I finished looking into that matter.

Chinese:

……“保坂晶”的資料。
German:
